transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sakshi baat kar rahi thi sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kya issue aa raha tha sir lead mein?
Customer: [unintelligible] jo isme mere ko jo lead hai.
Customer: Stone mein jyada nahi aa raha hai. Ye alag alag sab aa raha hai.
Executive: Matlab jaise ki aapka jo product hai uske...
Customer: Haan mera stone ka business hai. Stone mein lead valid stone mein aayega toh main kis se baat karke consume kar sakta hu. Lekin wo mere resin, polyresin, brass, wood ye sab aata hai.
Executive: Thik hai brass, wood ye sab aata hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir main aapke product ki mapping check kar leti hu.
Customer: To mapping ki problem hua to isse mere lead aa raha hai kya? Problem hai mere ko pata nahi.
Executive: Mapping ki issue hai sir main check karungi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sandstone Hanuman statue hai aapka. Granite bed stone hai, sandstone hai different maa Saraswati.
Executive: Lining meri.
Executive: Sir ye keh rahe hai ki inke paas jo lead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir aap sirf marble mein deal karte hai na?
Customer: Marble mein bhi haan marble mein mera black stone aur sandstone mein mera jyada deal hai.
Executive: Sandstone, black stone hai na? Isme apna jyada deal hai, thik hai. Brass aur metal mein deal nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi, brass, metal, wood aur aur kuch mein kuch mein main deal nahi karta. Kintu ye jo lead mere ko aa raha hai wo pura alag hai. Main kis se baat karu? Jo bhi aata hai lead mera pura jitna bhi mera ek hafta mein 17 lead mere ko milta hai consume karne ke liye wo to sab alag alag aata hai. Main kis se baat karu?
Executive: Haan samajh rahi hu sir main.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aapne bola statue dalane ke liye, statue aaya aapke paas. Elephant wala bhi statue se dalana hai na, marble karke dalana nahi hai. Aur buddha statue se to by lead consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: Buddha statue haan.
Executive: Sir aapka ye jo buddha statue hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir ji.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ye jo apna sir buddha statue hai iski by lead consume ki hogi sir aapne?
Customer: Haan abhi abhi.
Executive: Haan thik hai sir. Sir actually main batati hu ye jo apna ye buddha statue hai, elephant statue hai, Ganesh statue hai. Ye sab ye jaise Ganesh statue likha hai humne to Ganesh statue brass ke bhi hote hai, metal ke bhi hote hai to hume yaha pe na product ka jo hai name change karna padega.
Customer: Kya stone mein black stone, sandstone likh ke wo name change karna padega.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan ji. To jo maine khali statue likha hai Ganesh statue aur jo statue likha hai usko change karna padega, pathar ka dena padega, stone ka jo black stone ya sandstone.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji sir. Agar aap buddha stone likhenge thik hai to buddha stone ke to matlab buddha statue likhenge sirf thik hai. To buddha statue to kisi bhi metal ka bhi ho sakta hai, brass ka bhi ho sakta hai. Lekin apan sirf sandstone ya black stone mein deal karte hai to apne ko wahi likhna padega.
Customer: Haan ji, ji ji. To main fir update karna padega jo maine jo account pe dala hai jo photo usko update karna padega, name change karna padega.
Executive: Main main khud hi jo hai sandstone aur black stone Ganesh statue maine...
Customer: Thoda aap kar denge to achha hoga mere mere liye. Bana dega sir.
Executive: Baki abhi aapke lead delete ki thi.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Abhi aapne buddha statue ki lead consume ki hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Yaar mere ko fir ye jo jo maine photo account mein dala hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Price ke price ke wo fir usko name change karna padega. Edit karna padega fir.
Executive: Nahi nahi delete nahi edit karna padega bas sir delete nahi karna padega wo main kar deti hu.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Ji. Sir ye mapping ye mapping mam ye mapping kya hota hai? Mapping ke matlab kya hota hai? Mapping ke andar kuch hai kya jo mere ko lead aayega?
Executive: Abhi abhi agar aap free ho to main aapko video meet ka link bhejti hu aap usko join kijiye fir main aapko samjhati hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Apna system dikha ke kaise karte hai. Kya hai ki mere ko fir wo jo aata hai ka jo mere ko deal karna hai low price ka deal nahi karna hai aur aisa...
Executive: Main aapko sab link karti hu main sab batati hu sir abhi main aapko video call karti hu aur aapko main apna pura system dikhati hu ki kaise karna hota hai. Aap ek baar dekh loge aapko khud hi samajh aa jayega. Nahi aayega to main baithi hu aapke liye.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Kya hai ki mam hum thoda udiya ka aadmi wo samajh mein thoda kam aata hai.
Customer: Hindi to aa aa jata hai English mein thoda problem humko aata hai.
Executive: Jyada door ki nahi hu main bagal abhi kis state ki hu main aapke.
Customer: Ji ji mam.
Executive: Thik hai sir main a WhatsApp pe share kar deti hu aap waha se join kar lijiyega thik hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji mam.
Customer: Mera screen se share karo aapko?
Executive: Main screen share karke aapko bata dungi fir aap apna screen share karke puchh lena jo aapko dikkat hogi.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Ji. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Wants to know about mapping.

- Wants to deal with high price leads.



Resolution:

- Executive checked product mapping.

- Executive explained about product name change.

- Executive offered a video call to explain the system.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mapping, product name, video call
